close_door.description: Close the microwave door by swinging it to the closed position.

open_door.description: Open the microwave door by swinging it out.

close_door.description: Ensure that the microwave door is closed properly.

rotate_tray.description: Spin the rotation tray in the microwave.

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the body of the microwave to remove any dirt or stains.
